content: the text explains the progress of a legal case regarding the division of assets after the death of an individual the court made a decision on december 15 2021 stating that heir 1 heir 2 and heir 3 are responsible for different percentages of the total costs the case involved the division of various assets including real estate bank accounts and pension benefits the court determined that the son and daughter of the deceased will inherit the estate in equal shares the court received the death certificate and initiated succession proceedings the parties reached an agreement on the division of the estate so a probate hearing was not necessary the court assessed the value of the estate and divided the court fee between the son and daughter the court will issue a final judgment and forward it to the land registry for registration the heiress will also need a certificate of final validity to complete the succession process the text also explains the process of lodging an appeal in a legal case the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court providing necessary copies and information the appeal must be comprehensible and include the grounds for the appeal the court fee must be paid unless there are grounds for exemption or deferment the appeal can be sent by registered post on the last day of the appeal period

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, pension benefits
